definition: see 伊瑪目|伊玛目[yi1 ma3 mu4]
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
Neumann (surname)/John von Neumann (1903-1957), Hungarian-born American mathematician and polymath

sentences.english: President Barack Obama sent his good wishes to Emanuel.
sentences.chinese: 美国总统奥巴马向伊曼纽尔表示了祝贺。

sentences.english: Emanuel could hear the conversation of people in the room where his body was.
sentences.chinese: 伊曼纽尔可以清晰地听到房间里人们的谈话。

sentences.english: A friend of Emanuel testifies that this is true. The man has all scriptures in his head.
sentences.chinese: 伊曼纽尔的一位朋友后来证实这是真的。

sentences.english: 'You never want a serious crisis to go to waste,' Mr. Emanuel said.
sentences.chinese: 伊曼纽尔说，我们不该错过一场严重危机带来的机遇。

sentences.english: Emanuel then saw a very brilliant light across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 然后，伊曼纽尔看见一束灿烂的光横穿湖面。

sentences.english: Jesus took Emanuel back to heaven and showed him a beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣将伊曼纽尔带回天堂，并给他看一座美丽的城市。

sentences.english: They returned after hearing Emanuel's voice pleading for them to return.
sentences.chinese: 直到他们听到伊曼纽尔苦苦的哀求声才回来。

sentences.english: Then along came Immanuel Kant, very famous philosopher.
sentences.chinese: 随之而来的是著名哲学家伊曼努尔？康德。

sentences.english: Jacob Bohme; George Fox, founder of the Quakers; and Emanuel Swedenborg.
sentences.chinese: 雅各伯梅，贵格会乔治福克斯的创始人和伊曼纽尔威。

sentences.english: West apparently told a budget estimates hearing that Iemma instructed him to tackle the issue.
sentences.chinese: 西显然告诉概算听到伊曼指示他以应付有关问题。

sentences.english: After healing, Emanuel started his ministry of testifying to what he saw in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 伊曼纽尔康复后，开始传扬他在天堂见到的一切。

sentences.english: Emanuel Swedenborg was a Swedish scientist and religious teacher.
sentences.chinese: 伊曼纽尔斯韦登伯格是瑞典科学家和宗教教师。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993
Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God
Anwar (name)/Anwar bin Ibrahim (1947-), Malaysian politician, deputy prime minister 1993-1998, imprisoned 1999-2004 on charges including alleged homosexual acts, subsequently overturned
